column2: "EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ bio
"na se Taere dɛ
column4: eyɛ amanaman oguadzinyi ma nsuano aman pii
column5: mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: O Taere

column2: "W’ahe wɔ po finimfin
column3: w’adantofo ama wo ho ewie fɛw yɛ."

column2: "Senir kupresi ndua na wɔdze ayɛ wo ntaabow: wɔdze Lebanon nkyindur ndua ayɛ w’abradaandua."
"Bashan esudur ndua na wɔdze ayɛ wo ntabon; asombɛn a wɔdze ewurawura papaa a ofi Kittim nsuano do na wɔdze ayɛ wo mangow."
"Ndwera pa a ofi Egypt a woedzi mu akye na wɔdze yɛɛ w’abradaa
column3: ma ɔaayɛ frankaa; bibir tam a ofi nsuano Elisha do na wɔdze yɛɛ w’akatado."

column2: "Zionfo na Arvadfo no nye w’akwamfo: Taere
"Gebal nkɔdaa na n’enyansafo wɔ wo mu a wosisiw wo hɛn ne mbabaae: po do ahɛn nyina ɔnye hɔn hɛnmufo wɔ wo mu dɛ wɔrebɛsesa w’eguadze."
"Persiafo na Ludfo na Putfo wɔ wo dɔm mu wɔyɛ w’akofo etsitsir: wɔdze kyɛm na dadzekyɛw sensɛɛn wo mu; woyii w’ahoɔfɛw sii hɔ."
"Arvad mbarimba nye wo dɔm wowɔ w’afasu ho hyiae
column3: na Gammadfo no wɔ w’aban atsentsen mu. Wɔdze hɔn akyɛm sensɛɛn w’afasu ho hyiae; wɔama w’ahoɔfɛw edzi mu."

column2: "Tarsis yɛɛ wo guadzinyi wɔ ahonyadze horow nyina no dodow ntsi; dwetɛ
column5: na sumbui na wɔdze bɛgyee wo hɔ adze."

column2: "Javan
column5: hɔn na wɔyɛɛ w’abatafo: wɔdze nyimpa na boran ndzɛmba gyee w’eguadze."

column2: "Hɔn a wofi Togarma fie wɔdze mpɔnkɔ na ɔsampɔnkɔ na asoasompɔnkɔ bɛgyee wo hɔ adze."
"Dedanfo yɛɛ w’abatafo: esupruw pii yɛɛ eguaase maa w’edwinsa; wɔdze asonse na kusibir ntoaba nye wo bedzii nsesagua."
"Siria yɛɛ wo guadzinyi wɔ w’edwinsa dodow ntsi: wɔdze nserɛmɛmbo
column8: na wɔdze bɛsesa wo hɔ adze."

column2: "Juda na Israel asaase
"Damaskɔs yɛɛ wo guadzinyi wɔ w’edwinsa dodow ntsi
column3: ɔnam w’ahonyadze horow nyinara no dodow ntsi: wɔdze Helbon wenyin na nguannhwi fufuw bae."

column2: "Vedan na Javan dze asaabahoma nye wo bedzii sesagua: dadze a wɔabɔ
"Dedan dze aboɔdzen tam a wɔdze tsena pɔnkɔ do nye wo bedzii gua."
"Arabia na Kedar mbapɔmba nyina yɛɛ wo nsaano eguadzifo; wɔ nguambaa
column5: iyinom mu na wɔnye wo dzii gua."

column2: "Seba na Raama abatafo so nye wo bedzii gua: wɔdze eduhuam nyina mu etsitsir
column4: na sika nye wo bedzii sesagua."

column2: "Haran na Kanne na Eden
column4: Assur na Kilmad no nye wo bedzii gua."

column2: "Woyinom wɔyɛɛ abatafo wɔ eguadze fɛɛfɛw mu
column3: wɔ bibir tam mbobɔe na nkyermutam
column4: na ebirɛmpɔntam ndaka a wɔdze ahoma abɔ mu a wɔdze nkyindur ndua yɛe

column2: "Tarsis ahɛn nye w’akwantufo a wɔdze w’eguadze dzi akɔnaaba: na ebɛyɛɛ ma
column3: na w’enyim baa nyam papaara wɔ po finimfin."

column2: "W’akwamfo dze wo aba nsu akɛse mu: boka mframa abobɔ wo wɔ po finimfin."
"W’ahonyadze na w’adzetɔndze
column5: hɔn a wosisiw wo hɛn ne mbabaae
column8: na w’asafo a wɔwɔ wo mu nyina
column9: wɔbɔtotɔ po finimfin wɔ wo sɛɛ da no mu."

column2: "Wo hɛn akwankyerɛfo nkeka mu ne dede ntsi
"Na hɔn a wɔdzedze ntabon
column4: na po do akwankyerɛfo no nyina
column5: fifi hɔn ahɛn mu besiansian ebegyinagyina daadze
column7: "na wɔbɛpra hɔn ndze egu mu wɔ wo do
column8: na woesu suwen. Wobotu dɛtse egu hɔn etsifi
column9: na wɔdze hɔn ho ayankayankam nso mu:"

column2: "na wɔbɛprapra hɔn tsir na woefurafura eyitam
column3: na wɔdze ɔkra n’awerɛhow na mbubuwbɔ yaayaw esu ama wo."

column2: "Na hɔn ewuotwa no mu
column3: wɔbɛma sukwadwom do wɔ wo ntsi
column7: ɔno a wɔama ɔayɛ dzinn wɔ po finimfin yi?"

column2: "Ber a w’adzetɔndze fi po nyina mu bae no
column3: edze maa aman pii wɔmee; edze w’ahonyadze na w’eguadze dodow maa asaase do ahemfo nyaa hɔn ho."

column2: "Afei a epo bubuu wo wɔ esubun no mu no
column3: w’eguadze na w’asafo a wɔwɔ wo mu nyinara nye wo totɔree."

column2: "Nsuano aman nyina ho edwuruw hɔn wɔ wo ntsi
"Aman mu eguadzifo sesar wo; w’ewiei annyɛ fɛw koraa
column3: na eremmba bio ara ekesi afebɔɔ."
